Key Match Events: Rodrygo scored the only goal of the match in the 29th minute with a deflected shot.
Gabriel Magalhães made a crucial goal-line clearance to deny Moisés Caicedo's effort right before the break.
Post-Match Reflections: Rodrygo expressed happiness with the victory and his goal, hoping it helps Brazil improve and progress.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Brazil dominated possession but struggled to create clear chances.
Ecuador applied physically aggressive pressure, making it difficult for Brazil to penetrate their defense.
The match had an attendance of 36,914.
